alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Cheshire; Coastal Rockingham; Northern Carroll; Southern Carroll; Southern Grafton; Sullivan; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Heat Advisory issued August 07 at 12:04PM EDT until August 07 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heat index values in the upper 90s to around 100 expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central, southwest, and western Maine. Portions of central, northern, and southern New Hampshire. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures and high humidity may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. To reduce risk during outdoor activities, the Occupational Safety and Health Administration recommends scheduling frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.
